title: Identify this font... Please I need help!
content:
Please identify this font for me, the words ’mask’ or ’surferosa’

it looks like ITC surfboard or SL Titanes...

Thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172751im_/http:/typophile.com/files/480_6226.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172751im_/http:/typophile.com/files/surferosa_3975.jpg)

 [‹ visuelle kommunikation expo Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172751/http:/typophile.com/node/52209 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Dieci" Fat Slab ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172751/http:/typophile.com/node/51914 "Go to next forum topic")
author: LEZ

comments.content: S and S in surferosa are not alike. I suspect this was created with the pen tool in Illustrator.
